title: Ep 338 | Jase Almost Has His Man Card Revoked & Phil Is Wowed by Sadie
description:
Phil is impressed when Sadie shares the Word with 1,200 girls and more than 100 get baptized. Jase speaks to 600 people in the path of a hurricane but nearly has his man card revoked. Zach shares his eye-opening experience at a women’s conference. Phil talks about immaculate conception and the struggle that Joseph went through. And Jase gives an astronomy lesson based on the star of Bethlehem.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
